directions.step:
1. PREPARE 1 1/3 RECIPES BARBECUE SAUCE (RECIPE NO. O00200). BRING TO A BOIL; REDUCE HEAT. SIMMER 25 MINUTES.
2. DRAIN BEEF. ADD TO BARBECUE SAUCE. MIX WELL.
3. COOK 15 MINUTES OR UNTIL BEEF IS HEATED THOROUGHLY.
Recipe Number: L01801
SERVING SIZE: 3/4 CP (6
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
